hero.welcomeText: What drives me? Clean code, modern web technologies - and a penchant for well thought-out UI/UX. As a front-end developer, I combine technology with user experience.

about.title: My Long Story Short
about.about-top: My journey into the world of web development started back in 2017 when I was working on our first website with my brother. Even back then, I was excited about the creative design of frontends: colors, shapes, layouts - it was just cool to bring everything to life and connect it with code.

about-middle.three: – with a penchant for good UI/UX, a sense for clean code and the mission to develop high-performance applications that delight users. I enjoy transforming complex requirements into well thought-out, visually appealing interfaces. Every project offers me the chance to develop myself further - whether through new frameworks, sophisticated designs or exciting teamwork.

about.about-bottom: Let's turn ideas into inspiring digital experiences together.

projects.title: A look behind the code
projects.project-join: Join is a lightweight and flexible Kanban board application designed to help teams and individuals manage tasks and projects efficiently. Inspired by Trello, Join enables you to create boards, lists, and cards to organize your workflow seamlessly.
projects.project-pokedex: PokeDex is a sleek and educational Pokémon encyclopedia app built with modern web/mobile technologies. Leveraging the PokeAPI, it enables users to search and browse detailed Pokémon entries complete with stats, abilities, types, and artwork. Inspired by classic Pokédex tools, PokeDex delivers a clean, responsive interface that makes discovering and learning about Pokémon both intuitive and enjoyable.
projects.project-cursed-kingdom: Cursed Kingdom is a 2D action-adventure game that combines exploration, combat, and resource collection in a mysterious, cursed realm. Designed with a pixel-art aesthetic and responsive gameplay, Cursed Kingdom challenges players to gather coins and energy-restoring apples while battling enemies using bow and arrow mechanics. The game focuses on fast-paced movement, strategic shooting, and immersive level design for a captivating experience.

reviews.title: Feedback from real people
reviews.review-1: Heiko brings structure to every project. He always thinks one step ahead and finds pragmatic solutions that help us all. I have learned a lot from his coding style and his way of working.
reviews.review-2: Working with Heiko was super pleasant. He is helpful, shares his knowledge openly and pays attention to clean, understandable code - this has significantly improved our teamwork.
reviews.review-3: What I appreciate about Heiko: He brings calm to chaos. Even with tricky tasks, he stays focused and keeps his eye on the goal. A real team player with an eye for the essentials.
